input.sentences: the couple finally saw the greek shoreline out their window .
they were giddy with excitement and jumped up .
they were finally going to their homeland .
and | as the ship pulled in | they saw the church where their parents were married .
they walked to the steps and then watched the sun set on their first night in location .
